timeline.bodyText: Unit test for adding a link.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: This stuff at the top is just refactoring.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Minor, made these sets safe since they are public.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Add a set of Subtypes to add links for.
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Add link to new page for certain subtypes. We can add more info over time to http://cldr.unicode.org/translation/error-codes
timeline.author: macchiati

timeline.bodyText: Noticed some duplication that could be cleaned up, but didn't want to muddy the waters now.
timeline.author: macchiati
macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -103,8 +103,8 @@
 
 ^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/ordinalMinimalPairs\[@ordinal="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for ordinals. For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.
 ^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/pluralMinimalPairs\[@count="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for plurals (cardinals). For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.
-^//ldml/numbers/minimalPairs/caseMinimalPairs\[@case="([^"]*)"] ; Minimal pairs for cases used in the language. For more information, please see http://cldr.org/translation/getting-started/plurals#TOC-Minimal-Pairs.

timeline.bodyText: Fixed example text (the < causes problems in html.
timeline.author: macchiati
